data.description: This document defines the requirements for Device Management Smart Card (DM_SC) work stream, enhancing the role of the Smart Card started in the OMA DM v1.2 specifications (as defined in [ERELDDM]: [DMBOOT], [DMDDFDTD], [DMNOTI], [DMPRO], [DMREPU], [DMRD], [DMSEC], [DMSTDOBJ], [DMTND] and [DMTNDS]) and also making use of the functionalities provided by these latter specifications.
